body:
I did not look at this in the browser, maybe I'm getting it wrong. But in my understanding this should be a list of conferences. So something like:
```ruby 
ul
  li conference_1
  li conference_2
  # etc.
```

The ways your view code looks to me, this will only render a single `li` item (will all conferences in it...).
